ygData.subject: RE: Re: Hey, this sounded interesting
ygData.msgSnippet: been a while so i don t remember that, but i also don t remember it taking any longer to gain experience other than the known hell levels. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
been a while so i don't remember that, but i also don't remember it taking
any longer to gain experience other than the known hell levels.

Shada

>
> From: jhenders@...

> Don't forget, however, at least according to our former inside source,
> JM Cappozi, that they also massively increased the amount of exp
> required to level shortly after this without telling us. Still,
> psychologically, not losing 2+ bubbles when you die (man did
> that suck)
> is a lot easier to take, even if it takes just as long to
> make back the
> exp you lost as it did when you did lose it.
